name: Mined Maps
description:
Simple puzzle game made using Godot 3, to try the engine out.   An attempt make a "Single pixel" game.   

If it get though, grab a piece of grid paper, and map it out. 

Godot Code available at: https://github.com/MaxTayler/MineMaps

Made using  Godot 3.44, Blender 3,0
